description: Illustrates the enthusiastic reaction of children to the problem-solving approach to gymnastics. Explains movement language, teaching methods, and safety aspects. Presents movement education as a throught-provoking philosophy and an area of physical education catering for all levels of performance. Suitable for teacher tertiary levels.
